comments:
I have installed the StrutsBox plugin from Yoxos successfully. But when I create an dynamic web project form the wizard, and want to add the struts project facet, the exception occured. The detail information please find below:

Created an attachment (id=46157)
The error page
It looks like FacetInstallDataModelProvider is asking the ProjectFacetsManager for the facet with id "", which of course doesn't exist. Jason, any ideas?

traces.message: Project facet  has not been defined.
